10kg Automatic Dry Powder extinguisher.

Automatic extinguishers are ideal for use in confined spaces including engine rooms, plant rooms and switchrooms.

  • Fully refillable stored pressure units
  • Bracket included
  • 68°C red bulb supplied as standard – other temperatures available on request
